name: Falling Kingdom
description:
I wanted to teach my kids about how to make a game, so we sat down and assigned roles. My son (11) took on design and my daughter (8) took on art, while I provided all the code. Our ambitions quickly outstripped our ablity to deliever on them, so my wife convinced us to scale back and make a shorter demo game. This is that demo, currently very unpolished.

The plan is to add polish to this demo over the coming months, and if interest continues past that, to try making something a little larger.
